Regression module¶

statstuff.regression.linear(x, y)[source]¶

Calculates the intercept and the coefficient for a linear regression equation

Args:

x Explanatory values

y Dependent values

Returns:
float: The intercept and b the coefficient
statstuff.regression.predict(features, parameters)[source]¶

Predicts the due value given the regression features and parameters

Args:

features Regression equation features

parameters Regression equation parameters

Returns:
float: The value predicted from features and parameters
statstuff.regression.predict_sigmoid(features, parameters)[source]¶

Returns the sigmoid value for the predicted value from givem features and parameters

Args:

features Regression equation features

parameters Regression equation parameters

Returns:
float: The sigmoid value predicted from features and parameters
